QuestData.Title: Tying Things Together
QuestData.Description:
This coil of heavy rope seems to be in good condition.
Guardian Velomir said to keep an eye out for useful materials, perhaps if you can find a few more coils he might find them useful.
QuestData.RewardText:
What is this? Rope? There is no time to make a net!
Wait... I have an idea. There are some old weapons that we could use with these...
Good eye, $n! These are perfect!
